Spotlight




  1. State Water Board Adopts
    Statewide Emergency
    Conservation Regulations

    Press Release



    WATERING DAYS:

    ODD NUMBERED ADDRESSES (based on last digit of street address)- WEDNESDAY, FRIDAY and SUNDAY BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 8:00 PM and 5:00 AM

    EVEN NUMBERED ADDRESSES (based on last digit of street address) - TUESDAY, THURSDAY, and SATURDAY BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 8:00 PM and 5:00 AM

     DIAS DE RIEGO:

    CASAS CON UNA DIRECCION IMPAR (basado en el ultimo digito de la direccion) - MIERCOLES, VIERNES y DOMINGO ENTRE LAS HORAS DE 8:00 PM y 5:00 AM

    CASAS CON UNA DIRECCION PAR (basado en el ultimo digito de la direccion) - MARTES, JUEVES y SABADO ENTRE LAS HORAS DE 8:00 PM y 5:00 AM
